meanings.definition: Combine (two or more things) to form a whole.
meanings.sent1: She is integrating the different colors to create a beautiful painting.
meanings.sent2: The chef is integrating the ingredients to make a delicious soup.
meanings.sent3: By integrating the puzzle pieces, she completed the picture perfectly.
meanings.sent4: His innovative approach to integrating flavors resulted in a unique dish.
meanings.sent5: The artist's skill in integrating light and shadow brought the portrait to life.

meanings.definition: Bring (people or groups with particular characteristics or needs) into equal participation in or membership of a social group or institution.
meanings.sent1: The organization is integrating individuals from diverse backgrounds into their team.
meanings.sent2: The school is integrating students of all abilities into the same classroom.
meanings.sent3: By integrating new members seamlessly, the club became stronger.
meanings.sent4: Her leadership skills were crucial in integrating the team towards a common goal.
meanings.sent5: Integrating different perspectives can lead to more innovative solutions.

meanings.sent1: Adding the final piece will integrate the jigsaw puzzle.
meanings.sent2: She integrated the missing chapters into the book to make it whole.
meanings.sent3: Integrating the last ingredient transformed the dish into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: His efforts to integrate the data resulted in a comprehensive report.
meanings.sent5: The architect's design seamlessly integrated modern and traditional elements.
